title: Management Software For Printing Electricity Bill - EMAN - 2017
description:
Management Software For Printing Electricity Bill - EMAN - 2017 - ArmaanPC

You feel that it is too time consuming and time consuming to calculate a manual electricity bill or an Excel spreadsheet for a large number of households.
- You feel that aligning the correct data to the standard invoice form can be considered a torture, which annoys you.
All your issues are solved by: EMAN - Power Management Software (electricity, electricity for production, etc.)

Main functions: 
1. portfolio management
- information management of substations.
- Manage the lines.
- Customer Information Management.
- Manage employee information.
- Management of electricity tariffs, allowing for self-definition of
tariffs such as: o Tariff electricity tariff.
Price price list.
o Price list for administrative agencies, electricity for school
o etc.
- Permit to make invoices with the month of change of electricity price (eg 10 days old price, 20 days new price ...)
- Allow 1 customer to apply a variety of prices (for example: 30% electricity, 70% electricity production etc.)

2. Transaction Management 
- Monthly electricity bill for customers
- Automatic calculation of electricity bill at each price level.
- Just enter the new customer number, the system automatically calculate the used electricity number based on the old electricity.
- Allow invoicing with month of price change (old price and new price, very accurate according to EVN's calculation method)
- Update cash receipts.
- Allows entering customer data from Excel file
